eclasstool.model.drawingtools

Class Rectangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • eclasstool.model.drawingtools.Shape
      • eclasstool.model.drawingtools.Rectangle

  • public class Rectangle
extends Shape
    Class Rectangle provides methods to draw a Rectangle at the given location with the given size.
